sentence.Network_en: These elephantine oddities seem to carry messages.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些笨拙的古怪作品似乎在传达信息。

sentence.Network_en: Their daughter is quite plump but their son is positively elephantine.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的女儿很胖;可是儿子呢,简直像大象.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: via Latin from Greek elephantinos, from elephas, elephant- 'elephant'

entry.def: If you describe something as elephantine, you mean that you think it is large and clumsy.

example.tran: 因块头大而造成的笨拙

means.word_mean: 1. of great mass; huge and bulky;

auth_sentence.content: What matters most for this London-based quartet is writing songs with elephantine sing-along hooks.
auth_sentence.res_content: What matters most for this London-based quartet is writing songs with elephantine sing-along hooks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What matters most for this London-based quartet is writing songs with elephantine sing-along hooks.

auth_sentence.content: Senior jobs that, thanks to Birtist managerialism and elephantine dignity, didn't get done in the Savile-Newsnight affair.
auth_sentence.res_content: Senior jobs that, thanks to Birtist managerialism and elephantine dignity, didn't get done in the Savile-Newsnight affair.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Senior jobs that, thanks to Birtist managerialism and elephantine dignity, didn't get done in the Savile-Newsnight affair.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,"状态,药物等"; 3. "物体"; 4. 表名词,"人或女人"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 海的,海生的;船舶的,航海的

stems_affixes.word_buile: prist=first首先,最初+ine……的→adj.太古的,纯洁的,新鲜的
route路线,路程+ine……的→adj.常规的,例行的
serpent蛇+ine……的→adj.似蛇般绕曲的,蜿蜒的
anti反+febr热+ine状态,药物等→n.[化]乙醯胺苯,退热冰
caffee咖啡+ine状态,药物等→caffeine→咖啡因
fam饿+ine状态,药物等→n.饥荒,饥馑
route路线,路程+ine状态,药物等→routine常走的路线→常规

stems_affixes.value_cn: 凡士林,凡士林的商标名
stems_affixes.word_buile: vasel+ine状态,药物等→由商标名转化而来
con一起+cub躺+ine人或女人→一起躺着的人→情妇
figure形体,蒴像+ine人或女人→figurine小塑像
hero英雄+ine人或女人→n.女英雄;女主角
philist菲力斯人+ine人或女人→n.庸人,市侩
